name: Punishment Dragon
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while 4 or more of your "Lightsworn" monsters with different names are banished, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP; shuffle all face-up banished cards and all cards in the GY into the Deck, except "Lightsworn" monsters. Once per turn, if your "Lightsworn" monster activates its effect: Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY.
